title: Ticket #3789: Test VM support like we test Java support.
description: It would be nice to test the VM universe tested VM support they way the Java universe tests Java. (If this is already true for VMWare (doubtful), make it true for KVM and Xen, as well.) That is, when the startd starts up, it should do something to verify that it can start virtual machines (run a VM universe job).
remarks: Evidence from CHTC suggests that the ability to run VMs may decay over time, and should be rechecked regularly.
